arts.ttl: Christophe Pélissier’s coaching principles enabling Auxerre to succeed
arts.sum: Playing in their second Ligue 1 campaign over the past three seasons, AJ Auxerre have enjoyed tremendous success in recent times. The reigning Ligue 2 champions are on a four-match…

Two promoted sides with very different outlooks this season face each other at Stade Abbé Deschamps on Sunday evening. Auxerre are hoping to grab their third win in a row, hoping to continue their p...
